name: Once10
description: This is a visual novel about 60 minutes in length, telling a story of memories.he visual novel "Once10" is a story which will recall the experience of many individuals.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 625M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i3 3GHz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
